sentence: El Presidente del Puerto de Cartagena, Antonio Sevilla, ha recibido a Santiago Apóstol, patrón del barrio de Santa Lucía, que ha llegado en barco de vela latina con remeros a la Dársena de Santiago.
translation: The President of the Port of Cartagena, Antonio Sevilla, has received Santiago Apóstol, patron of the neighborhood of Santa Lucía, who arrived by Latin sailboat with rowers at the Dock of Santiago.

sentence: Este evento ha tenido lugar dentro de los actos religiosos celebrados en honor al Santo a lo largo del último fin de semana.
translation: This event took place within the religious acts celebrated in honor of the Saint throughout the last weekend.

sentence: Junto a su familia, autoridades de Cartagena y cientos de personas, el Presidente de la Autoridad Portuaria se ha mostrado complacido por formar parte de esta asentada tradición, parte esencial de Cartagena y de sus ciudadanos.
translation: Along with his family, authorities from Cartagena, and hundreds of people, the President of the Port Authority has expressed his pleasure in being part of this "established tradition, an essential part of Cartagena and its citizens."

sentence: El acto, que se ha encuadrado dentro de la Solemnidad de Santiago Apóstol, comenzó el viernes 22 de julio con el Pregón de Exaltación en honor al Santo, a cargo de la Consejera de Cultura y Portavocía de la Región de Murcia, Noelia Arroyo Hernández.
translation: The event, which was framed within the Solemnity of Santiago Apóstol, began on Friday, July 22, with the Exaltation Proclamation in honor of the Saint, given by the Councilor of Culture and Spokesperson of the Region of Murcia, Noelia Arroyo Hernández.

sentence: Desde la Dársena de Santiago, acompañado de flores, una comparsa musical de gaitas y de numerosos representantes públicos y vecinos de la localidad, se ha llevado al Santo en procesión hasta la Iglesia de Santiago Apóstol de Santa Lucía, en donde se ha celebrado la solemne eucaristía, presidido por el Reverendo Don Juan Rosique Egea, Arcipreste de la Zona Norte de Cartagena.
translation: From the Dock of Santiago, accompanied by flowers, a musical troupe of bagpipes, and numerous public representatives and neighbors, the Saint has been taken in procession to the Church of Santiago Apóstol de Santa Lucía, where the solemn Eucharist has been celebrated, presided by Reverend Don Juan Rosique Egea, Archpriest of the North Zone of Cartagena.
